problem_text:
17.25. (S. P. Farbman). Let X be the set of complex numbers α such that the group generated by the two 2×2 matrices I+αe12 and I+e21 is not free on those generators.
a) Does X contain all rational numbers in the interval (−4, 4)?
b) Does X contain any rational number in the interval [27/7, 4)?
Cf. 4.41 in Archive, 15.83, and (S. P. Farbman, Publ. Mat., 39 (1995) 379–391).
G. M. Bergman
